recipes.label: Get a Commission from William Jericho
recipes.startdescription: The kindly professor from Cambridge has studied history his whole life. He now seeks to study the Histories beneath the one he knows.

recipes.label: Fulfill a Commission for William Jericho
recipes.description: I've increased my favour with the Cambridge professor. Perhaps in time I will reap the dividends of this friendship.

recipes.label: A Commission?
recipes.startdescription: Good day. Is the commission going to be long yet?

recipes.label: Call on a small favour from the kindly Professor.
recipes.startdescription: A lesson? Well, I suppose you can sit in on one of my lectures.
recipes.description: I know that these things can be very droll, but I hope you found it useful.

recipes.label: Call on a large favour from the kindly Professor.
recipes.startdescription: Hmm, I think a bit of private tutelage would be best suited here.
recipes.description: Well, that's that from me. I'm glad that you're taking an interest in academic matters.

recipes.label: Call on a substantial favour from the kindly Professor.
recipes.startdescription: This is a pretty involved topic, but I think I can give you a couple of books that will help.
recipes.description: No, no, keep them. I insist.
